name: Targa
description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: YORM
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Competition
Based on Gotlieb Yorm’s original design, the Targa is a light, high performance, competition-grade generator that revolutionized racing.
description_cn:
物品类型：护盾生成器
制造商：约姆公司(YORM)
尺寸：1
等级：C
类别：竞赛
基于戈特利布·约姆的原设计并加以改进，这款"塔尔加"护盾生成器是一款足以颠覆竞速行业的轻量级高效能护盾生成器.
